updates.HtmlString: Updated marketing cards to be more accurate for set, plus set chances as 1:3 token:marketing for core sets, 2:3 for expansions, and 9:1 as of Battle for Zendikar.
Foil rarity changed from 1:8 to 1:7.4 and now include basic lands.
Added Set Boosters, with The List and Art Cards.
Returned the guaranteed double-faced card to the Draft Boosters, this time overriding the correct slots.
No longer overrides slot 10 with extra U/R/M. Thanks, Josh!
Double-faced cards now replace card of same rarity.
